common.name: Stone Golem
common.description: A slow but sturdy creature made of ancient rock.

common.name: Swift Rogue
common.description: A sneaky thief who strikes from the shadows.

common.name: Fire Imp
common.description: A mischievous demon that spits small fireballs.

common.name: River Serpent
common.description: A slippery snake that lurks beneath the water.

common.name: Woodland Archer
common.description: A skilled bowman who never misses a shot.

common.name: Undead Squire
common.description: A fallen knight who still serves in death.

common.name: Thunder Beetle
common.description: A tiny insect that crackles with energy.

common.name: Magma Cub
common.description: A young lava beast learning to control its fire.

common.name: Goblin Tinkerer
common.description: A crafty goblin who loves to make explosives.

common.name: Feral Wolf
common.description: A wild beast that hunts in the darkness.

common.name: Crystal Sprite
common.description: A tiny spirit that glows with mystical energy.

common.name: Sand Raider
common.description: A desert bandit who preys on travelers.

common.name: Vine Lash
common.description: A sentient plant that ensnares its foes.

common.name: Torch Bearer
common.description: A brave warrior who lights the way.

common.name: Cave Stalker
common.description: A creature that lurks in the deep shadows of caves.

common.name: Plague Swordsman
common.description: A novice fighter with a steady blade.

common.name: Sky Gull
common.description: A bird that scouts from above.

common.name: Frost Bat
common.description: A winged creature that thrives in the cold.

common.name: Mud Hulk
common.description: A lumbering giant of earth and sludge.

common.name: Twilight Fox
common.description: A cunning predator that blends into the night.

epic.name: Shadow Assassin
epic.description: A master of the night, striking without a trace.

epic.name: Stormcaller
epic.description: A powerful mage who commands the fury of storms.

epic.name: Frost Guardian
epic.description: An ancient warrior encased in enchanted ice.

epic.name: Infernal Warlock
epic.description: A dark sorcerer wielding forbidden fire magic.

epic.name: Bone Reaver
epic.description: A skeletal knight who reaps souls.

epic.name: Titan Hunter
epic.description: A warrior who slays mighty beasts.

epic.name: Bloodmoon Priestess
epic.description: A mystical seer of the crimson moon.

epic.name: Iron Juggernaut
epic.description: A nearly unstoppable war machine.

epic.name: Phantom Duelist
epic.description: A spectral warrior bound by an unfulfilled challenge.

epic.name: Arcane Sentinel
epic.description: A guardian infused with ancient magic.

epic.name: Blightborn Alchemist
epic.description: A twisted scientist who brews deadly poisons.

epic.name: Eldritch Summoner
epic.description: A sorcerer who calls forth horrors from beyond.

epic.name: Runebound Paladin
epic.description: A holy warrior infused with ancient runes.

epic.name: Volcanic Behemoth
epic.description: A towering creature of molten fury.

epic.name: Clockwork Colossus
epic.description: A mechanical titan fueled by arcane energy.

epic.name: Void Walker
epic.description: A cursed wanderer slipping between dimensions.

epic.name: Hellfire Warlord
epic.description: A ruthless conqueror who wields flames of damnation.

epic.name: Celestial Monk
epic.description: A divine martial artist who channels cosmic energy.

epic.name: Nightmare Stalker
epic.description: A horror from dreams, hunting in the shadows.

epic.name: Doomforged Gladiator
epic.description: A warrior who fights eternally in the cursed arena.

legendary.name: Celestial Dragon
legendary.description: A majestic dragon with the power of the cosmos.

legendary.name: Titan of the Abyss
legendary.description: A godlike being born from the darkest depths.

legendary.name: Phoenix King
legendary.description: A reborn ruler who wields the flames of eternity.

legendary.name: Eclipse Knight
legendary.description: A warrior bathed in the power of a dying sun.

legendary.name: Void Champion
legendary.description: A champion who rules the endless darkness.

legendary.name: Throne of Storms
legendary.description: A living tempest that bends lightning to its will.

legendary.name: Chrono Warden
legendary.description: A keeper of time who bends reality itself.

legendary.name: Dragonborn Tyrant
legendary.description: The ruler of a lost empire of fire and fury.

legendary.name: Archmage of Eternity
legendary.description: A sorcerer who commands the flow of existence.

legendary.name: Seraph of Dawn
legendary.description: A divine being who ushers in a new age.

legendary.name: Godhand Champion
legendary.description: A celestial warrior with unmatched strength.

legendary.name: Soulforged Titan
legendary.description: A being created from the will of fallen heroes.

legendary.name: Riftborn Specter
legendary.description: An entity slipping through space and time.

legendary.name: Eternal Warlock
legendary.description: A mage who has lived countless lifetimes.

legendary.name: Celestial Hydra
legendary.description: A mythical beast with endless regenerative heads (using photosynthesis)

legendary.name: Starborn Warlord
legendary.description: A conqueror who commands the power of the stars.

legendary.name: Primordial Behemoth
legendary.description: A creature older than time itself.

legendary.name: Doomsday Prophet
legendary.description: A seer who foretells the end of all things.

legendary.name: Stormborn Leviathan
legendary.description: A sea creature capable of summoning tempests.

legendary.name: The Cosmic Judge
legendary.description: A divine entity who enforces universal balance, woooooo.
